member.name: T:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths
member.summary: Various Geodesic methods to work with the plugin api This class is based on the javascript library geojs by Roman Nurik See http://code.google.com/p/geojs/

member.name: F:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths.EARTH_RADIUS
member.summary: Earth's radius in metres

member.name: F:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths.EPSILON
member.summary: Smallest significant value

member.name: F:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths.MILES_TO_KILOMETRES
member.summary: Miles To Kilometres Conversion Ratio

member.name: M:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths.FixLongitudinalAngle(System.Double)
member.summary: Keep a Longitudinal angle in the [-180, 180] range

member.name: M:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths.FixLatitudinalAngle(System.Double)
member.summary: Keep a Longitudinal angle in the [-90, 90] range

member.name: M:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths.DegreesToRadians(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts decimal degrees to radians

member.name: M:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths.RadiansToDegrees(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts radians to decimal degrees

member.name: M:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths.KilometresToMiles(System.Double)
member.summary: Convert Kilometres To Miles

member.name: M:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths.MilesToKilometres(System.Double)
member.summary: Convert Miles To Kilometres

member.name: M:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths.NormaliseAngle(System.Double)
member.summary: Keep a number in the [0,PI] range

member.name: M:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths.ReverseAngle(System.Double)
member.summary: Reverses a number in the [0,PI] range

member.name: M:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths.DistanceHaversine(GEPlugin.IKmlPoint,GEPlugin.IKmlPoint)
member.summary: Calculates the great circle distance between two points using the Haversine formula
member.returns: The distance between the given points in metres

member.name: M:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths.DistanceVincenty(GEPlugin.IKmlPoint,GEPlugin.IKmlPoint)
member.summary: Calculates the great circle distance between two points using the Vincenty formulae This function is based on the geodesy-library code by Mike Gavaghan See http://www.gavaghan.org/blog/2007/08/06/c-gps-receivers-and-geocaching-vincentys-formula/
member.returns: The distance between the given points in metres

member.name: M:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths.AngularDistance(GEPlugin.IKmlPoint,GEPlugin.IKmlPoint)
member.summary: Calculates the angular distance between teo points
member.returns: The distance betweent the given points

member.name: M:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths.Heading(GEPlugin.IKmlPoint,GEPlugin.IKmlPoint)
member.summary: Calculates the initial heading/bearing at which an object at the start point will need to travel to get to the destination point.
member.returns: The initial heading required ibn degrees

member.name: M:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths.IntermediatePoint(GEPlugin.IKmlPoint,GEPlugin.IKmlPoint,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates an intermediate point on the geodesic between the two given points See: http://williams.best.vwh.net/avform.htm#Intermediate
member.param: Intermediate location as a decimal fraction (T value)
member.returns: The point at the specified fraction along the geodesic

member.name: M:FC.GEPluginCtrls.Maths.Destination(GEPlugin.IKmlPoint,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the destination point along a geodesic, given an initial point, heading and distance see http://www.movable-type.co.uk/scripts/latlong.html
member.returns: The point at the location along the geodesic
